need help getting the events manager working its keeping me from going live with a campaign
I can help with that! Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you're using for the events manager? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Great! For setting up a Voluum postback on NewsBreak, you can follow these steps:
1. In NewsBreak, go to Event Management and select WebEvents → Create/test web event.
2. Name the event, select Postback, choose Voluum as the tracking service, and choose your event type.
3. An endpoint URL will be generated based on your inputs. This is the URL you'll need to paste in "Traffic source postback URL" in Voluum.
4. Add the parameter in the NewsBreak Traffic Source element in Voluum as the T parameter must be matched with dynamic token to pass the NewsBreak back to NewsBreak.
5. You can test your Traffic Source postback URL directly in NewsBreak Event Manager by scrolling down to Test Postback integration and pasting your Voluum Campaign URL.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to set up a Voluum Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/24825901083277-How-to-set-up-a-Voluum-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need further assistance!
